parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tread Separation and Failure of Firestone SteelTex Radial R4S Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected failure of the tire due to tread separation can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially fatal consequences.
symptoms: The tire tread separates from the belt
and loss of control. The tire may still have air in it
but the tread has completely come off. In some cases
where there are dips in the mid-section of the tire.
